author: Simon Difford
description: This peachy coloured Margarita is well-balanced and flavoursome with zesty orange liqueur sitting well with cranberry.
name: Rosarita Margarita
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
